lemma rule_sub_remark_5: assumes "\<And>v.[(\<phi> \<^bold>\<rightarrow> \<psi>) \<^bold>\<equiv> ((\<^bold>\<not>\<psi>) \<^bold>\<rightarrow> (\<^bold>\<not>\<phi>)) in v]" and "[\<^bold>\<box>(\<phi> \<^bold>\<rightarrow> \<psi>) in v]" shows "[\<^bold>\<box>((\<^bold>\<not>\<psi>) \<^bold>\<rightarrow> (\<^bold>\<not>\<phi>)) in v]"
